short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Preview any color using its color name or hexadecimal code!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Have you ever need to preview a color while in your browser?  Well...now you can!  All you have to do is click on the extension on the top right and boom!  You can enter a color and watch the background of the popup change into that color!  I will be adding copy and paste capability in a couple of weeks so be ready!  You may enter hexidecimals and normal color names that are supported.  View supported colors here!  (http://bit.ly/Colors_CarterSnook)
    Enjoy!

_________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________

I have now made four chrome extensions!  Here are all of them:
    •  Docs Theme - http://bit.ly/Docs-Theme_CarterSnook
    •  MiniTube - http://bit.ly/MiniTube_CarterSnook 
    •  Color Preview - http://bit.ly/Color-Preview_CarterSnook 
    •  Galaga - http://bit.ly/Galaga_CarterSnook
